property description: Welcome to Hollis Wharf – the perfect student accommodation for both University of Bath and Bath Spa University students! Our fantastic property is just a 6-minute drive from the Bath Spa campus and a 26-minute bus ride to the University of Bath, so you'll never be late for class. But what makes Hollis Wharf your ideal student hub? Picture this: You're hanging out in our communal spaces, mingling with fellow students, and tackling your assignments in a cosy environment. That's what our communal spaces are all about – fostering friendships and boosting your study game. Exploring Bath City Centre is a breeze from Hollis Wharf. It's a leisurely 31-minute walk, an 11-minute cycle, or a quick 20-minute bus ride (bus number 5). So, whether you're up for sightseeing, dining out, or shopping, you're well-connected. Looking for some downtime? Our games room is the answer. Challenge your mates to a game of pool and watch the stress of university life melt away. Need a moment to reset or just want a break from the buzz? Our Quiet Room is the perfect spot to unwind, catch your breath, or focus without distractions – ideal for study breaks or mindfulness time. Plus, with our luxury student accommodation being located along the iconic River Avon, you can take a scenic riverside walk straight into the heart of the city! And if you’re all about waking up to calming views, ask about our Riverside View Rooms. Some of our rooms look right out over the water - giving you that peaceful, scenic vibe every single day. Trust us, it’s a great way to start your morning. Got a trusty bike? We've got secure storage facilities, so you can keep it safe and sound without any worries. Doing your laundry will never be an issue here cause our on-site laundry room makes it a breeze to keep your wardrobe fresh and clean. And, of course, we know how crucial fast Wi-Fi is for students. Say goodbye to buffering and hello to seamless online studying and streaming. Hollis Wharf is designed with you, the university student, in mind. So, relax, study, and make lasting memories in your new student accommodation in Bath.

property description: Welcome to Ryan Hall, your new home in the heart of Belfast. This new luxury student accommodation has been designed to offer fantastic value and flexible tenancy options, all within the vibrant Queen's Quarter. Our prime location is a stone's throw from the main Queen's University Belfast campus, making us the perfect choice for Queen's students.
public_transport_time_str: quick and direct route across the city that takes you to within walking distance of the main campus

property description: Welcome to The Edge, a brand new luxurious student accommodation in Belfast. With brand new studio rooms and flexible tenancy lengths available, The Edge offers fantastic value for money, strategically located close to all major universities in Belfast so you can reach the campus with ease. Ulster University is a mere 1-minute walk away and Queens University Belfast is only a 9-minute cycle and 20-minute bus ride away. The close proximity of the accommodation to the excellent transport links means that you will never be late for class! If you are an art/design student, you are in luck because the Metropolitan Arts Centre is just a short walk away. You can enjoy art galleries, performances, workshops and so much more, whenever you like! The Edge boasts an array of modern amenities like no other designed to enhance your well-being and academic journey. Unleash your inner fitness enthusiast in our state-of-the-art fitness suite and dedicated yoga/Pilates studio. But that's not all – we've got an amazing outdoor well-being garden with it, allowing you to find your inner peace while surrounded by nature. When hunger strikes, our modern dining facilities provide the perfect setting for sharing delicious meals with friends. Looking for fun and relaxation? Our games lounge and cinema room are the ultimate spots to unwind, create memories, and bond with fellow students. When it's time to hit the books, our dedicated study area is tailor-made for maximum concentration, ensuring your academic success. And if you need a place for group projects or important meetings, our meeting room with conference facilities is at your service. Say goodbye to laundry hassles – we've got you covered with convenient on-site laundry facilities. No more carrying heavy laundry around every week, cause you won't even have to leave the property for it! Plus, for those students who like to cycle, secure bike storage is available so you can safely store your bike with no worries. Stay seamlessly connected with high-speed Wi-Fi, and here's the icing on the cake: all your bills are included, simplifying your budgeting and giving you peace of mind. The Edge isn't just accommodation; it's a vibrant community that supports your growth, well-being, and academic success. Get ready to embark on an extraordinary student journey in Belfast, where every day brings exciting opportunities!
